Instructions: 1. Log into Unity. 2. Navigate to 'Order Management' > 'Search'. 3. Enter the Customer Name or Account Number. 4. Click the 'Salesforce' link in the results to open the account directly in CRM.

1. Access the 'Digital Customer' section from the Customer Tab. 2. Use the 'Digital Customer Maintenance' screen to view assigned roles. 3. Review the 'Customer Site' to ensure proper alignment between Unity and Salesforce.
